cyclone.name: BETA
cyclone.current_location: about 45 miles SE of Port O'Connor, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: moving west-northwest toward the central Texas coast today, then forecast to slow, turn north and finally northeast along the upper Texas coast into Louisiana Tuesday–Wednesday
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near Port O'Connor / Matagorda Bay, TX

weather_observation.watch_coast: Baffin Bay to Port Aransas, Texas
weather_observation.warning_coast: Port Aransas, Texas to Morgan City, Louisiana (Tropical Storm Warning); Port Aransas to Sabine Pass, Texas (Storm Surge Warning)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: middle and upper Texas coast and southwestern Louisiana coast
weather_observation.wind: Intermittent tropical-storm-force gusts (40–45 mph) possible Monday afternoon through early Tuesday
weather_observation.storm_surge: 1–3 ft of inundation possible in Corpus Christi Bay and adjacent bays
weather_observation.rainfall: 5–10 inches of rainfall with locally higher amounts could cause flash and urban flooding
weather_observation.other_hazards: Isolated tornadoes and dangerous rip currents along the middle Texas coast
